Amazon delivered beyond my expectations! I love this TV show but did not start watching it until mid-way through season 4. Now I know what is being referenced in the current season!! I will make a collection of this show & will get my future seasons from Amazon.

As a TV nut, most of my favorites are definitely from cable shows, often leadingto a discrimination of sorts to network dramas that don't compare to Mad Men, The Wire, etc. However, shows like Hannibal and especially The Good Wife show how ballsy and excellent network shows can be. I bought this pack on a whim, not having seen a single episode and boy, am I glad that I did. The show has so many layers that keep me stimulated. As a law student, the legal plotlines always kept my attention and there's always plenty of political and marital moments to keep me on the edge of my seat. The Good Wife is incredibly underrated by TV purists.
I would recommend this series to anyone who enjoys a good lawyer/courtroom type show.  I never watched the series on TV so I'm happy to have this.
Best way to watch is with complete season DVDS WITH NO COMMERCIAL BREAKS. INTERESTING AND GRIPPING PLOTS AND TWISTS. WORTH WATCHING
The Good Wife 4 pack met all my expectations.  Great quality, new package as promised. Shows played without any problems.  This is a wonderful item.
